metadata.name: META∞CONSCIOUS #1/33
metadata.description:
Digitally illustrated sound mandalas to elevate your wallet. 
∞∞∞  
Meta Mantras is an invitation to bring awareness and centering to our multi-dimensional being as we travel deeper into the Web3 Metaverse and all its dualistic landscapes.  
∞∞∞  
'META∞CONSCIOUS' is the Genesis piece to the Meta Mantra collection and is a channeled, intuitive expression of perception through experience. 
Community is built by individuals connecting and sharing with one another,  but it is easy to lose oneself in the pursuits of ego.  
Use this piece as a tool to focus and visualize self awareness and discernment to remain centered within all this FOMO that surrounds us.
